name: girl friend simulator
description:
--------Main gameplay--------

Within 2.5 meters with her,
after the cursor is focus on her:
--------Use the right mouse button to chat with her.
--------Use the left mouse button to touch her, Or you can also pick up the item with the button (Only some things can be picked up).
--------Use the "Tab" key to view her current properties.

Use the "Q" key to put down item.
   
She may ask you to help her with some tasks, you just accept or reject.
Such a task requires a certain degree of goodwill.
If you accept it, you need to finish it.
Of course, you can ignore it.

The degree of goodwill is mainly improved through dialogue or completion of the tasks she gives you, and when it reaches a certain level, can interact with her more intimately.

This is not all, other please try it yourself.


--------Other--------

The game button can be viewed in menu by pressing the "Esc" key in the game.
If performance is low, you can improve performance by setting to window mode ("F11" Key or set in the menu) or by reducing the shadow quality level.

The current version is not the final version, the game will continue to update until the final version.
the price of the final version will rise by 60%, buy in advance to enjoy discounts.
